Package org.youscope.plugin.matlabscripting

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MatlabConnectionListener
    Implement this interface to be informed when a remote connection has been established or lost.
    MatlabInternalProxy
    Methods that can be called to control MATLAB except for MatlabInternalProxy.checkConnection().
    MatlabInternalProxyReceiver
    Implement this interface to receive a MatlabInternalProxy.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LocalMatlabProxy
    Allows for calling MATLAB from within MATLAB.
    MatlabConnector
    This class is called on from MATLAB.
    MatlabScriptEngine  
    MatlabScriptEngineFactory  
    RemoteMatlabProxy
    Allows for calling MATLAB from outside of MATLAB.
    RemoteMatlabProxyController
    A convenience class that allows for controlling a single remote session of MATLAB without having to create a RemoteMatlabProxyFactory and then create a RemoteMatlabProxy.
    RemoteMatlabProxyFactory
    Use this class to create instances of RemoteMatlabProxy.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MatlabConnectionException
    Exception that represents a failure to launch and connect to MATLAB.
    MatlabInternalException
    A wrapper around com.mathworks.jmi.MatlabException so that the exception can be sent over RMI without needing the jmi.jar to be included by the developer, but still prints identically.
    MatlabInvocationException
    Exception that represents a failure to invoke a method on the MATLAB session.
